name: Monster in the Forest
description:
Monster in the Forest

10 minute horror game. It's 1980, two sisters go camping in the middle of nowhere at the request of their father.

Little do they know that the ultimate evil was there with them.

Controls

  • WASD - walk
  • T - toggle tutorial
  • E - interact
  • F - toggle flashlight
  • P - ping location
  • LMB (hold) - zoom
  • C - toggle CRT

My first game made using the Godot engine, be sure to leave feedback and suggestions it will help a lot.

Also, I have no idea if it will work on Mac so be sure to leave a comment saying if it does, please and thanks :).
